features: Advanced Anti-Colic Design: Smilo baby bottles feature a unique and patented anti-colic vent system, reducing discomfort and gas for a happier feeding experience for newborns and infants.
Optimal Flow for Newborns: Our baby bottles offer a slow flow ideal for 0-3 months, simulating natural breastfeeding and facilitating a smooth transition for breastfeeding babies.

Adaptable to Growing Needs: Expandable with additional nipple sizes (sold separately), the Smilo bottle grows alongside your baby, accommodating their feeding requirements at every stage of development.

Simple Cleaning, Uncompromised Safety: our newborn bottles provide effortless cleaning without sacrificing top-tier quality and safety, ensuring a worry-free feeding experience. All parts are BPA-free and safe from toxic chemicals.
Trusted Smilo Brand: With a reputation for excellence in baby care, this 3-pack of infant bottles offers a reliable solution for parents seeking top-notch feeding solutions for their little ones.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smilo for a fuss-free feed. Smilo nipples have a unique internal shape for a controlled, smooth flow. This easier flow helps baby to use less suction energy. Their relaxed lips make a softer, more airtight latch and they swallow much less air - up to 44% less air. That’s what we call real anti-colic. Combining our unique air vent and deeper latch design, Smilo nipples help baby have an easier, uninterrupted feed. Simple. Compared to other feeding bottles, Smilo delivers more fluid for the same effort. That's how we minimize babys colic-forming air intake. If your family is transitioning to Smilo we recommend trying a nipple stage flow slower than you currently use. Smilo Bottles come fitted with Stage 0 Nipples, suitable for Newborn to 2 months. Faster flow nipples are available to meet your babys growing developmental needs. Our nipple stage guide will help you select the correct flow rate for your child’s developmental needs. The age guidelines are approximate and some babies may take up to a week to transition to the next stage.
Patented smooth flow nipple and a leak resistant vent Deeper latch with a relaxed mouth seal for an anti-colic feed Fewer parts are easy to clean and dishwasher safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST BOTTLES EVER
reviews.reviewText: I used these bottles with my second child and it was the best decision I've made. He disliked all other bottles such as Dr. Brown, Avent etc I've tried all of them and none of these helped with Anti-colic. THESE BOTTLE ARE PERFECT AND I RECOMMEND TO BUY THEM! These are a life saver! Goodbye to colic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these
reviews.reviewText: I had been looking for replacement bottles and saw these and decided to give them a try. When I say money well spent. When I saw my 6 month old love it I said I had to order some more and I did. It’s spill proof, easy for my baby to hold, easy to clean and easy to mix formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are it!
reviews.reviewText: I love the clean look on these bottles! I use these bottles for both formula and breast milk, which do not stain or stick to the bottle as neither does the breast milk oily fattiness. I've been sanitizing my bottles 1x a week in the dishwasher and to this day they have held up great! These bottles look like glass bottles and are super light weight! I've had for 3 months and just ordered my second stage nipples and the larger size bottles to use as my little one grows. I really can not compare to other bottles as far as my son latching better or less to others as I only gave tried these and he latched on right away. The shape of the bottle is prefect for my 3 month old to now hold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the only bottles that my child will latch onto
reviews.reviewText: Blessed smilo still makes these bottles such a big lifesaver I have tried every brand you can think of in my baby would not latch on the SMilo bottle works perfect for my baby and she loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: im a mom of 3 and i wish i would have found these bottles sooner i love them!!! will be buying more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definately top 2 bottle!
reviews.reviewText: I love these!! They clean wonderfully, not cloudy!! They work wonderfully and They are beautiful! The nipples that come with the short bottle are 0-2 months... which is what I needed- but they sell the other stage nipples on the site, which is awesome so I can use the bottles forever.I like them better than Como because they're clear, I can see what's left better. they're skinnier, easier to hold for feeding an infant, baby like them better too. Also with como, you have to be careful not to queeze them as milk with shoot into BBs mouth(not cool bro). I'll still use the como bottles bc they're great bottles too, they clean well and they're super cute! I feel like the Como will be better as my son ages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are amazing! Got the large ones for my 2mo old because they'll last longer. They are super easy to clean, the plastic is a clear as the day we got them and hasn't turned foggy or dingey. The numbers on the side are easy to read. Although my baby does still spit up a bit it has gotten sooo much better since we switched to these bottles. If I had to be nitpicky I'd say my only criticism is that the caps are super hard to put on and remove but that's not that big a deal. Also I'm not a fan of the replacement nipples coming in packs of 6 when the bottles come in packs of 3 but, once again, not that big a deal.Love these bottles! Will recommend to anyone who asks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The clarity of the Aqua & new purple bottles I don’t like
reviews.reviewText: I’ve ordered a set of purple bottles I love them so much I just wanted a different color so we could have one color for milk & one color for cereal bottles one the Aqua are not clear at all so I’ll be returning them I’ve just ordered some new purple bottles the same issue with the aqua one I don’t like these it has the Sam issue I’m just gonna keep the second purple ones I’m so overwhelmed with this
